spec_data.Name: R2spec
spec_data.Description:
R2spec is a small python tool that generates spec file for R libraries.
It can work from a URL or a tarball.
R2spec provides R2rpm which generates rpm for R libraries using the
R2spec API.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:07:16 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Python script to generate R spec file
